projects.name: Na Und?
projects.description: An experimental game of choice made during the Goethe-Institut Boston’s iteration of the 48-hour Art Games game jam.

projects.name: Generate
projects.description: An intersection of computer science and art.

projects.name: Chimerical Colors
projects.description: An exploration in colors that don’t exist! Stare at the X until the screen changes color. Explanation included in my Colors are Complicated blog post.

projects.name: The Mechanical Orchestra
projects.description: Floppy drives that play music, controlled using an Arduino UNO.

projects.name: What’s Up?
projects.description: An in-progress tool I’m designing to help manage reminders and todos.

projects.name: Playing Cards
projects.description: A playing card concept for my Art Foundations course (Google Chrome only).
